Posts.Content: Great news,about this new herceptin. I had a year of IV herceptin and as i had a bad reaction , it had to be administered slowly over 3 hours !!!! Great to see all the research is paying off.
Posts.Title: Hooray for SC Herceptin!

Posts.Content: Hi Annie Your story sounds just like mine. I was only diagnosed last week and my op is tomorrow..... I joined recently and although i havent sent many posts but i read everyones stories every day. it helps me hugely, just knowing so many are going through the same stuff, thoughts, feelings etc. Â Good luck. Stay strong.. x dawn x
Posts.Title: 'officially' joining
